caption.p: ( a) Representative C–S–H structure for Ca/Si = 1.09 showing the Calcium silicate network and the interlayer spaces, and ( b) water content (H 2O/SiO 2 molar ratio) as a function of Ca/Si molar ratio for representative C–S–H structures with saturation water content, ( c) The bulk modulus, and ( d) density as a function of Ca/Si molar ratio for representative C–S–H structures with saturation water content.
